title: Is there ever going to be League events hosted by Riot in Auckland again?
body: I mean... The only things we get now is live streams at Hoyts. Why doesn't Riot have a presence at Armageddon anymore?

replies.body:
They weren't at armageddon last year due to them wanting to [focus mainly on the OPL. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/FljIO587-2015-armageddon-expo-auckland-is-league-of-legends-coming-im-gunna-be-sad-if-it-isnt)

If you want Auckland based league events, like regular viewings+ giveaways join the UOA LoL club (you don't have to be a student to join, but for some events you have to be over 18 due to them being held in bars.)

[Here](https://www.facebook.com/groups/UoALoL/?fref=ts) is the Facebook link, more official signups will probably happen around the uni's Oweek (club membership is $10 a year (price might have changed for 2016, idk yet) and it covers things like giveaways, discounts at pbtech and cheaper rates at an internet cafe on wakefield street.)
